resources.string: Powered by BackBlaze, ib2d2 for Android is built on B2 Cloud Storage. B2 Cloud Storage is an affordable cloud storage solution that challenges the pricing and reliability of Amazon S3, Microsoft Azure, and Google Cloud. B2D2 was originally developed in Python as a tool to assist system administrators with backup management. ib2d2 for iOS was a wrapper of B2 which allowed BackBlaze customers to interface with B2 Cloud via their phone. ib2d2 for Android does not require a BackBlaze account, adds team sharing features, increases security, and works to make ib2d2 more user friendly.
